Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	But he of whom the umbilical cord is pulled out tightly, let him be treated with a lead nail as we have said for several days until it is enlarged.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	But those in whom the umbilical cord is not in its place, they are sick, and this is why: because he who is born and the umbilical cord is drawn out from the end of the penis because he cannot urinate from the parts inside, while he lifts up his penis with his hand to the parts above; and it is not generation because the sperm cannot reach the mother according to rectitude, and it is a great illness.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the manner of the operation in him is that the patient be laid on his back, and you extend the head of his penis with your left hand by a violent traction, and insert the end of the umbilical cord into the foreskin with a sharp knife, just as it is incised with a feather, or you scratch some part so that the membrane of him comes like the head of the penis, and that the umbilical cord falls in its proper place according to what each person has.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And beware in your operation of bloodletting, because many times this happens there; and apply to him something that stops the blood, and heal the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter .lvi.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Of albitter which happens in the foreskin on the head of the penis, and of corruption and blackness and adhesion of the foreskin of the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Many times this albitter happens in the penis and is an eminence of flesh that is sick.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one is malignant and the other is not malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Non-malignant, let him be hung up with a subtle thread and cut it off so that the whole thing comes out; and then apply to that cut submerging in Egyptian ointment; and then heal it with fine ointment until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	And if the albitter is malignant, of a bad color, then let him receive cautery at its incision and its root.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	But if the albitter is in the foreskin of the head of the penis and not circumcised, and one part of the albitter is inside the foreskin and the other part is outside, then let him cut off the albitter that is inside at the beginning so that it is consolidated; and then heal that hole, because when you heal that foreskin, it is not certain that it will not be torn.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And it has been seen that this happens in the genitals and in the foreskin blackness and corruption, therefore let him cut away everything that is already blackened and wants to become corrupted or what is already corrupted; and then apply on that a line with honey, which is pounded with bran of pomegranate and crushed and sifted.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And then heal it with the other cure until it is healed.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	But if there is bloodletting, then administer lunar cautery according to this form:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	because the cautery of juice is for two dispositions together, that is for bloodletting and for the wound when it is corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corroded and is destroyed all at once, then let him insert into the meat of the foreskin a lead cannula so that the patient urinates through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adhesion of the foreskin with the head of the penis (and this adhesion does not happen except in him of whom the foreskin is not circumcised; and when adhesion happens by wound or by blister) let him scrape with a blunt knife so that the ligament is dissolved and the head of the penis is liberated from all parts.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to pull off those closely, then let him scrape with a sharp knife the cause of the head of the penis and the foreskin; and this is why the foreskin, when it is thin, easily pierces through its thinness quickly.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And then separate between the foreskin and the head of the penis with a subtle thread, which is already moistened in the water wiped so that they do not adhere another wound.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then let it be healed with white vitriol until it is consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter .lvii.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	Of the cleansing of children and of the cure of that which happens to those who are circumcised.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not a cure of continence like the other wounds: but rather since it comes from our operation and from our will, and its root is properly in children, it is necessary that we assign to it better operation and way more the longer route is lost to health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Therefore I say that the ancients did not prescribe circumcision in any of their books, because they do not use it in their laws, and it is not except that we have acquired by experience, which cause is that I have observed the greater part of the artisans and barbers using circumcision and cleansing with a knife and torches; and they use ligament with wax and incision with the nail.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have already prohibited all these manners and not found better cleansing with tweezers, with ligament with wax that in cleansing with the nail, because many times the cord of the foreskin on two tunics, and the loose tunic is pulled from above, and it is very easily forced to another incision and pain is secured.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And in the cleansing which is done by the apothecaries, and it is with the finger, of which the surgeons use, the incision of the extremity of the virile member is not secured, because it very easily goes into the groove of it.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	But in the operation with the nail, it very often damages iron and corrupts your operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the child’s cord is short by nature, and many times it happens in such a way that it does not need cleansing, and I have seen this.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	But of the cleansing which is done with tweezers and ligament with wax, its goodness, I have discovered through experience, because the tweezers are of proportional incision, therefore that the acuteness which is above is also like the acuteness which is below; and then when you put your hand so that they are proportioned two acutenesses, and insert according to a comparison in one time; and compression of the wax is made with a figure containing the cord of the penis all around, with which no error of all can be caught.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the manner of the first operation is that you make the child be very still if it is one of those who understand a little, and you do not do but that you tie the wax on the penis only so much, and that you leave it within another day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then let him cheer up in all that way which is possible for you to receive his intelligence.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then have the patient lie between your knees, and let him be carefully positioned, not falling asleep; and hide the forceps in your hand or under your foot, so that the child does not see them nor any of the other instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	And then put your hand into the vagina and blow into the cervix, and draw it in so that the head of the cervix comes out, and then cleanse it of what is accumulated there from filth.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	And then tie the place that is marked with a thread of wool, and then put a little lower from that a second thread, and hold it with your finger and press the place of the ligature underneath so that it holds well, and cut between two threads.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then lift the cervix upwards and pull out the head of the cervix; and let the blood flow little by little, for that is better; and put powder on it and on the powder put a cloth in which is spread mallow gum mixed with recently roasted oil; and leave that on there for another day; and heal that with ointment until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the forceps for cleansing, this is their shape:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	The ends should be blunt and the other sharp, so that the ram of the claw does not come out, and the length of both points should be equal to the length of two handles joined together.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	But the mistake in cleansing is that sometimes the cervix goes in completely, or it breaks away from the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore, you should push it out with your finger before the apostemation of that place and insert it according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your finger, then pull it out with a needle and insert the needle.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if three days have passed and the apostemation under the cervix has not gone down, then you should put something into it so that the apostemation is cauterized, and cut that with ease, and insert it according to how it was prepared for you.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And beware of the head of the cervix, because it will not bear that.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	And therefore heal that with what the plague is consolidated by powders of which we have spoken in the treatise on powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it has been cut too much and obeys what is above, that does not matter to him.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	But heal that with what we have said so that it may be healed.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter .lviii.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	Of the healing of urine retained in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by obstruction caused by a stone or congealed blood, or by inflammation or ulceration, and resembles those we have spoken of in the division of urinary diseases.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved and retention of it is caused by a stone which is already in the neck of the bladder, then have the patient bend over his knees.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	Then have the feet of the patient supported on something below his back and the patient's belly extended from the part above his back, and the patient should press on his chest as much as is possible for him.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then the neck of the bladder being compressed there is expulsion of the stone to the parts behind, so that the urine is voided.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if it is not dissolved with what we have said and the cause is made vehement on the patient, then administer extraction of him with an instrument which is called a syringe, of which this is the shape: It should be of silver and be made hollow like a reed pen with a quill of goose feather made hollow in likeness to a long reed about a palm and a half in length, to which there should be a tube made hollow at its end.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the manner of the ejection of urine through it is that you take the thread doubled and wet in the end of it with wool or cotton with good wetting; and insert the ends of the thread into the end of the syringe, and with forceps if any superfluous cause from the wool, but insert it into the tube with vehemence. And then fill the syringe with water and oil.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	And let the patient lie on his back, and insert the bladder and cervix of him with oiled water, olive oil, and oils.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Then insert the syringe with ease so that it reaches the root of the cervix; then double the cervix above at the part of the foreskin; and press the syringe into it; and press it in until it reaches the bladder, and let the patient be bent so that the cause is empty, and do not make an incision according to this order, but go through tortuosity.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then extend the thread with wool little by little, for the urine will suck the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract it and cause urine by healing, and use the syringe, do not cease doing this until the bladder is evacuated and the patient is relieved.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter .lix.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	Of the quality of clysterization of the bladder with camphor and with similar instruments which are appropriate for that.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there happens in the bladder ulceration or apostemation, or congealed blood in it, or constriction of the ureter, and you want to distill water and medicines into it, then have the instrument called a camphor bag made, and this is its shape:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	But in the end of it there should be a hole, so that it is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in it have three holes: two on one side, thus alternately.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	At the beginning there is a hollow place in which is put what is to be inserted, and it should have an amount that pushes that, its addition, so that when any cause is pulled from the humidities, it is pulled, and when it is expelled, with that it is pushed, and when it is expelled far, according to how the clampcedra is used with which naphtha is smeared on the sea-shells.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore, when you want to inject moisture into the bladder, insert the end of clampcedra into the moisture, and pull with that what is pushed on the parts above, for the moisture is pulled in the hollow of the clampcedra.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then insert the end of the clampcedra into the cervix as we have prescribed in the syringe; and press the moisture with what you press it, for that moisture will pervade the bladder immediately, and the patient will feel that at once.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The shape of the subtle clyster by which the bladder is clysterized, and it is this shape:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And it should be made of silver or lead, whose head, moreover, should be similar to a small feather, and under it there is a tube within the hollow.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then take the bladder of a goat and put in it the moisture which you want to clysterize in the bladder, then tie that between two with strong ligature with doubled thread, and heat that moisture over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then insert the end of the clyster into the cervix.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	And then press your hand on the bladder with pressure descending so that the patient feels that that moisture has already pervaded the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if you do not have a bladder at hand, then take a piece of parchments and make of that a circle; and pierce that in all its rotundity; and then insert strong thread into those holes, thus as it revolves, and then put the circle as it is put together, because when you put in that what you want of moisture, oil and water.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then you insert that into the instrument and do with it as you did with the bladder, and express with your hand until moisture reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the extraction of stones.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already spoken in the division of stones about their kinds and the cure of them by medicines, as well as the difference between stones formed in the kidneys and those formed in the bladder, and their signs.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have spoken about that kind of stone which requires operation by hand, and incision.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the stone formed in the bladder itself is that which is lodged in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I will briefly narrate that with a clear exposition.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	I say that stones formed in the bladder most often occur in children. And their signs are that the urine that leaves the bladder is like water in its thinness, and it appears in that sand; and the patient feels burning when he urinates, and often has difficulty urinating; and with this there may be blood in his urine.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is difficult to cure this in the old, but easier in children who have reached the age of 12.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But it is milder for them because they are younger.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And if the stone is larger, its cure is more difficult; and if smaller, the contrary.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore, when we come to the cure of this, we should first cleanse the patient with a clyster that opens up the entire passage which is in his bowels; for sometimes that opening prevents the expulsion of the stone after examination.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And then let the patient be laid on his back and made to groan and strain in order that the stone may descend into the bottom of the bladder, or jump up from its place sometimes.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then let him make an effort with his arms and legs while he is lying on his back, so that the whole bladder may be made to decline towards its lower parts.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then let him make an effort to urinate.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Therefore, if you feel the stone in that space, then you should cut it at once.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if it does not come out at all by your touch, then let the patient smear oil on his left index finger or middle finger if he is a child, or the tip of the little finger if he is an adult, and insert that in his anus.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And so let him expel the stone by pushing it with his finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And gradually push that into the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And then press on it with your finger, and expel it out through the place where you made the incision.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And command the assistant to press the bladder with his hand; and command another assistant to extend the testicles upwards with his right hand, and with his other hand to press on the scrotum beneath the testicles, in the part where the incision is made.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert the spatulum so that its narrow end enters first; this is how it should be done:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	and cut into the space between the anus and testicles, not in the rectum, in front of the left testicle; and let the incision be over the stone and the incision on the finger be in the anus, and let the incision be transverse, so that the opening is wide and the wound narrow according to the size of the stone that can be expelled from it without any compression, for fear of the finger being crushed in the wound.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that there is some stone whose angles and edges make its emission difficult for that reason.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And that is like a grape in shape, and it is round, and it is easier to expel from it.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Therefore, if it is the kind whose angles and edges are sharp, insert it into the incision.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not easily expelled, then let you push on that or tighten it with a decent grip, the end of which should be like a file by which to tighten around the stone, and not slip off it; or insert below it a slender instrument with a curved end.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot move it, then let you enlarge the wound a little, and if you see blood flowing, stop it with burnt vinegar.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if there are more than one stone, then at the beginning push your finger to the mouth of the bladder, and then insert it over them; and then push in a little bit there; and do likewise if there are more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, then it is folly to insert that with a great incision, for there are two causes why this happens: either because the patient dies or he develops continuous urination because the wound is not completely healed.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	But let the assistant expel it when it is expelled, or insert it into the fracture with forceps so that he can extract it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Therefore, when you have finished your operation, then fill the wound with cotton wool and dragon's blood, and tighten it.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place a cloth soaked in oil and wine, or rose-oil and water, over it so that the wound may be cleaned by cauterisation.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then let him lie on his back, and not loosen the bandage until the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when he has loosened it, wash the wound with water and oil, and then cure that with ointment of diafenicon and ointment of diabasilon until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	But if the wound becomes hot and ulcerated, and it seems as though the blood has congealed in the bladder, and there is no urination (and that is called by the egress of blood with urine), then insert your finger into the wound and extract that blood, for if it remains, it will provoke corruption of the bladder and putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with sharp wine, water and salt, and apply to it all manner of remedies, by which means he will be cured until he is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And let him lie on his back during all the cure, and you apply both testicles and adjust the medicines which are laid upon the wound.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and lodged in the urethra, and there is no urination, then cure that by what means you can insert it before the incision is made, for there are many remedies which have been proved to be effective against this; and indeed you can use an iron punch covered with velvet, of which this is the form:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	triangular in shape, pointed, made on a stick.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And then take a punch and insert it into the urethra below the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And then insert the iron into the urethra, piercing with ease until the punch reaches the stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And turn the punch with your hand around that small stone little by little, and pierce it from both sides so that you can penetrate it from the other side; for the urine is then absorbed.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand over the opening so that it is tight around where the stone was before the urethra was pierced, for that is cramped, and there is no egress of urine, and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this cure is not prepared for any reason which prohibits it, then insert an iron below the stone, and another iron above it.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then you light a fire on the stone in that groin between two ligatures.
E aprop extratz aquela.	Then take out that object.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	Then untie the ligament and clean the clotted blood which is caused by the plague.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And the ligament of the bladder is not necessary except to prevent it from returning to the vesica, and the other ligament above except that when the bladder is untied the cord returns to its place and cures the plague.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason when you tie the bladder above, you must lift the cord to the parts above so that it returns to its proper state and cures the plague as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter 61.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of stones from women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Stones in women are seldom generated.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	But if you see a stone in one of them, then its cure is difficult and prohibited by many methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of these is that the woman is very young.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you do not find a woman who knows how to examine her if she is chaste or is one of those married women.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you cannot find a woman skilled in this art, especially for the operation with your hand.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the site of the incision for a stone in women is distant from the site of the stone, so it requires a deep incision and there is fear in that.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if necessity compels you to do this, then know that you must take a female doctor who is very skilled, and she is seldom found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you lack that, then seek a skilled doctor and subtle or present a female midwife skilled in the affairs of women or a woman who in this art has made progress in the art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	So do that presentation and command her to do everything you order her to do from the inquiry about the stone at the beginning; the cause is that she examine whether the woman is a virgin then know that she puts her finger in the anus of her and feels for the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	So if she finds it, hold that under her finger and then command her to insert it into that.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if she is not a virgin, then command the midwife to insert her finger into the vulva and feel for the stone, since she places her left hand over the bladder, and grip that with good pressure.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	So if she finds it, then know that gradually pull that from the orifice of the bladder to the parts below with the top of her finger which came through that to the root of the groin.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	Then insert into that the tip of the finger from the vulva over the root of the groin from whatever part it is stopped at and grasp the stone in that part, and the finger of her not be pushed back by the stone holding it there.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And the incision should be small at first; then insert the needle into that incision and if she feels the stone, then make a second incision according to the amount she knows the stone will be pushed out of that.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that the kinds of stones are many: for some of them are small and large and lean and rough, and long and round having horns.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	So you know how many species there are of it therefore you signify above what you want.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you see bleeding, apply verdigris crushed and wet that for an hour while the blood is clotted, then return to your operation when the stone has been pushed out.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And prepare with you the instruments which you use in the extraction of stones in men so that you are aided by those in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see bleeding and know that the discharge of blood is from the artery which is cut, then you place powder on the site and tighten that with a ligature, and do not touch that; let go of the stone and do not extract it for the woman will surely die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	Then cure the plague.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	So when the sharpness of the bleeding has ceased, and the site is healing, then you return to your operation when the stone has been pushed out.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	On incision for hernia acute.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia aiguo is nothing but an accumulation of moisture in the white membrane which is below the diaphragm containing the intestines and is called the sac.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And sometimes it is in the proper membrane which nature has prepared in the part of the sac while it is another sac; and it is the diaphragm between the white membrane which we have said, and that is nothing but fat.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is from weakness which occurs to the intestines, for to those is poured out that matter, and sometimes occurs by blow made upon the intestines.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And that moisture has many colors for the color of it inclines to yellow or blood-red or red or is black and sludgy, and that is what is most.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the marks by which it is known that this accumulation of water is in the white membrane which we have said, then the pustule is round declining a little to length thus with figure of sac and appears the intestine for the moisture contains all parts.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the proper membrane then the pustule is round with part of the sac and for that man estimates that it is another sac.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the diaphragm of the intestines and the white membrane then cut below the center.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And when you want to know the color of the moisture then you try the color of the moisture in the pustule with a needle of which the point is preceded; and according to what comes out on the tip of the needle judge about what there is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	So when we come to the cure of it with fire then know that we command the patient to be bled if that is possible for you, and see the body of him full.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then let it be resupine over his back on any cause a little higher, and place below him pieces of linen.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	Then sit on the left side of him and command the midwife to follow on his right side and she extend her finger to one of two sides to the diaphragm of the intestines and at the part of the navel of the belly.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	Then take a flat knife and cut the diaphragm of the intestines of the middle location for the length inside near the anus.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And let the incision be made according to right-angle equally distant from the line which should pass through the hair of the intestines, so that it comes to the white membrane including it.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	Excise that and observe, and beware lest you not insert it; and your incision with which you excise it by part cuticle which is suspended at the sac more and scrutinize with your incision according to the amount possible for you.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	Then pierce the sac full of water with wide perforation, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	Then separate between two lips of the incision with pincers and extend the sac to the parts above; and do not touch the diaphragm of the intestines containing it and insert the sac in that way which is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	Then insert that with its totality or in pieces and especially its sides slender for if you do not scrutinize the incision of it strictly there is not assurance that the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if the hernia protrudes through the opening in his abdomen during your operation, then when you have finished the incision of the scrotum, return it inside and sew the two lips of the abdominal wall of the scrotum with a stitch, and treat it as you would any other wound until it heals.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the hernia腐ed by another disease, then cut the vessels which are under the suspensory ligament, remove the hernia, and treat it with what we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the hernia is divided into two parts, then you should know that there are two hernias; therefore, operate on that part in the same way as you did on the other; and if it seems to you that it is one operation, then perform it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And you should wipe away the blood, and enter into the incisions wool soaked in oil or in rose oil; and put outside another wool which you have soaked in wine and oil, and spread it over both testicles and the scrotum; and place on top folded cloths and powders, and tie those with a ligature which is according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	and let there be two pieces of cloth and they are filled with wool dyed red according to this semblance; and the ends with which it is pressed are made of string or of wet wool, and they are tied tightly in the waistband of the underpants, and one end goes from the back between the two, and the second goes to the front part of the scrotum, and two ends on each side go below and the other two on the sides, and all fastening is tightened in the waistband of the underpants.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes this hernia is treated artificially with cautery instead of an incision with iron; and you should take a sharp cutting cautery and insert it into the scrotum of the testicles, and ignite it according to what we have recommended until the white sac containing the hernia is exposed, and then you should use cautery according to this form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is like the Greek letter alpha.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And you should pierce with that cautery, and ignite it until all moisture is driven out.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And you should extend the scrotum with tongs, and cut it with tongs, and cauterize with a sharp cautery ignited; and insert it according to what is possible for you until you have removed everything; and beware of the hernia that the fire does not touch it.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is more safe and more distant from bleeding, and better than an operation with an incision.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you see an abscess formed in the hour of incision or in the hour of cautery, or bleeding, then you should treat whatever inconvenience there is for you with treatment which suits it according to what has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is fearful and does not await the second operation because of its horribleness, then you should perform piercing according to what I have recommended; and it is when it is certified that you must, by what we have said about the significators, know that the hernia is aqueous.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then you should have the patient lie on his back on a high bed, and pierce the abscess in its lowest part with a broad spatula, and make the piercing according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And the opening should be large enough for all the water to flow out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And you should place string and tie it there, and leave it, so that the remainder of the water flows out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And you should treat it until the wound is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is an inconvenience in the emission of the hernia in that hour when you pierce it: and this is not done except because the white membrane in the opening of the wound causes inconvenience and prohibits the emission of the hernia, then you should put into the wound a needle or instrument with which the hernia is extracted from the hydrocele, the form of which is preceded; or place under pressure on the hernia a small ball.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And know that the hernia returns, and is held back for several months or years; and when it is accumulated, then it should be pierced according to that same manual method, for thus will the patient pass his days.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter .lxxxiii.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	Of incision on a fleshy hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in the incision on this hernia, there is usually great fear of death in those with the most disposition; for I have seen the dismissal of it and being saved by that better.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am remembering the operation on that one and the species of the abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that abscesses arise in the bodies of which the testicles are composed and it is done for many causes: or by acute acute superfluity, which is secreted to the testicles, or by piercing.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess is according to the color of the body, and there is no pain in it, and it is a heavy abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And very often it is an abscess calcified, of which the color is dark, and there is no sensation in it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And sometimes it is done by a node of the membranes, and by inflammation of those from which there has already been perceived a memory of it, or by inflammation of the veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	But that which is by inflammation of membranes is known by the dispersion of the abscess when you compress it with your fingers; and it should not be touched.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	But that which is done by inflammation of a vein is not dispersed at all for any cause because of compression with the fingers.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that on this species there should be incision and on the other meats; and you should insert the scrotum of the testicles, and extend the hernia to its parts above, and extract it from the white sac, and ligature the testicles, and insert them into the sac after you have extracted it from all parts of the hernia.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the hernia is already consolidated in those meats, then you should extract the hernia and insert it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is adhesion for any cause of the scrotum, or between that which is between the sacs, then you should loosen all that adhesion and insert it by a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is raw flesh in the place of the adhesion which is behind, then you should insert all that is of it and extract the hernia as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when your operation is complete, then fill the wound with wool soaked in rose oil and wine; and treat it with the other treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter .xciv.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Of the treatment of hernia which is of veins.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Veins is an abscess wrapped in any wrapper similar to a swelling with softening of the testicles, and there is difficult exercise and walking on the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the treatment of this disease, it is by fear for that from which is preceded memory.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, let us examine its operation according to those which are first.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And I say that you should have the patient lie on his back on a high bed; and tighten the testicles to their lowest parts with cords; and you should tie the scrotum of the testicles to its lowest part with cords according to what has been proven in the rod; and hold those other servants which you have, and extend them with violent extension.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And you should insert with a broad spatula through an incision transversely in the right of the sacs until they are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And then you should remove all hair from the affected area, as we have said before regarding hair removal using archery tools, which are in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	Then you should insert a double-headed needle into those places where there are veins, and tie one end of the thread to the front of the affected area, and the other end to the back of it.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	Then you should cut into them in the middle, according to the length of the body, and extract what is accumulated from the fetid and putrid humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then you should treat the wound with a cure for other wounds in which you want pus to be generated, so that the vessels which have become black from one of two things may fall away, which is not harmful.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if the veins are affected everywhere, then you should either extract the testicles or tie off the vessels connected to them, so that they are deprived of all nourishment through the cutting of the vessels, and that they wither away, or else that they are tied off so that there is no benefit to them.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65:
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The cause of this hernia is due to an opening that occurs in the diaphragm extending over the belly, from which some intestines protrude through that opening.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the diaphragm or due to an incision there, and these two types occur for various reasons: due to a blow, or from jumping, or from shouting, or from lifting something heavy, or from similar activities.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this, when it is due to an extension of the diaphragm, is that it occurs gradually over a long time, and not suddenly, and there is swelling underneath the skin due to the diaphragm compressing the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of this type is that it causes intense pain right away; and there is a diverse appearance of swelling below the navel, and this is due to the protrusion of the intestine, and the body is pushed out at the edges of the diaphragm.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the intestine slips out with its covering, and this type of hernia is called intestinal hernia with a sac.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it occurs due to hernia with a sac, and sometimes there is a tear in the intestine, and it gets stuck there, and this causes great harm to the patient, and sometimes it causes intense pain especially when it is pressed upon.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in treating this illness with iron, there is fear involved because it is easy to damage the intestines.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the method of performing this operation is that you command the patient to draw in his intestines with his hand into their cavity if he obeys your instructions, and then have him lie on his side between your hands, and lift his legs up.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then you should tighten the skin that covers the testicles at the top, and cut all around the testicles with your knife; and then insert two hooks into the incision to pull it open according to what you command them to do.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the incision is as large as it needs to be so that nothing of that which has slipped out is left behind, then you should close it up.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then you should remove the skin that covers the diaphragm under which the testicles are located, and reveal the white and firm diaphragm underneath in each area.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then you should put your finger into what holds the testicle, in what is between the white diaphragm and the diaphragm below, and between the diaphragm according to its location, and release it from the adhesion that is in the back part of the abdomen.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then you should hold the skin of the testicles at their openings, and extend the white diaphragm with your left hand, and lift up the abdomen with the diaphragm to the side of the incision; and command the assistant to extend the abdomen inwards while you release the adhesion that is behind it with a complete solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And close with your fingers so that there is no cause for the intestine to be wrapped in the white and firm diaphragm.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause for it, then you should push it back into the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then you should take a needle made of six threads, and insert it behind the diaphragm below the testicles, which is where the incision occurs; and then you should pierce through both ends of the thread so that they stick out like horns, and then you should attach one end to each horn with a strong ligature made of two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then you should wrap the ends of the threads and tie them with a strong ligature so that none of the vessels which cause blackness can pass through, so that there is no chance of swelling due to cauterization.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And place another bandage according to the wound after the first bandage, a distance of three fingers; and leave these two bandages loose from the scrotum which is below the testicles the quantity of the size of the finger, and wind all the rest according to the roundness, and hold it by the hole.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then cut at the end below the scrotum through a section from which blood and pus will flow, as we have recommended in what we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then administer wool soaked in oil, and place it on the wound; and administer the bandage which we have recommended (and sometimes the scrotum is cauterized white, which we have said close to the cut of it they fear the flow of blood, because many times these occur) and leave the bandage so that by itself it falls.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the falling of it is delayed, then let water and lye be heated, and place it on that area so that it falls according to what we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the wound with another cure for wounds so that it heals.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66.
De hernia ventosa.	Of a wind hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia I have not seen anyone who has been burned on the cure of it with iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first said that it is made thus as we have recommended in the hernia that is with wine; which is that you tie the vessels close to the section on it with ease of it; and then dry in the middle place around the abscess with that which opened it, while the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound as we have said so that it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the rupture that is made in the intestines.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes this rupture in the intestines as we have said, and they project the place.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not give any cause to the bowels by the bowels; and if they give, it is little; and return in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time with that is prolonged, it is a fissure in the scrotum so that the intestine descends into the scrotum; and this happens because of the extension of the scrotum which is in the intestines as we have said, the cause of which is that the scrotum is extended, and then it becomes soft, and the place is an abscess and projects.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the cure for it is with cautery as it is preceded by the narrative of it.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with iron in this way: and let the patient lean over on his back between their hands, and then dry the place of the rupture of the abscesses that project with a cut according to its width according to the quantity of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white scrotum which is below so that it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the band and place it over the prominent place of the scrotum, and press it on the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent places on the end of the band of the scrotum, and adjust one of those to the other with the stitch.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.
